Sentencas: Thermal nature of multiple effect distillation (MED) process causes the integration of a desalination unit with a high-temperature power cycle like gas turbine in combination with the solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: The improvement in energy efficiency is achieved as a result of this combination.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: This configuration can be introduced as an effective system for the electrical energy-freshwater production.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency of solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) is reported about 60%.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: Small-scale MED unit is presented as a solution for heat recovery in the 300-1,000kW range of (size of SOFC) SOFC-GT power cycle.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: The exhausted heat of SOFC-GT power cycle is used in heat recovery steam generator to produce a required motive steam for the desalination unit.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: Simulation, parametric studies, and economic analysis of proposed system are carried out to investigate the system performance.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: Economic analyses are applied based on the annualized cost of system method.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED

Sentencas: Results show that the combination of MED with SOFC-GT power cycle makes the system more economic.
Titulo: Simulation and economic evaluation of small-scale SOFC-GT-MED
